Chinese | Korean

join International Alliance

to Expand Magnesium Industry

• US-China Magnesium Industry Conference

welcomes Galaxy Executives to Yulin, China

• Charlie Gay joins Galaxy as Senior Vice President

• Galaxy and WHY Resources sign Letter of Intent

Galaxy Magnesium a leading direct source of magnesium, evolutionizing global industries with light, strong, versatile, durable and green magnesium. Magnesium is superior in many ways to steel or aluminum alloys.

Galaxy is streamlining global supply chains, offering custom alloys for unparalleled performance, and delivering all-inclusive pricing, direct from the most productive magnesium mines in the world, with real-time commodity trading.

From automotive, aerospace, energy and construction, to finance, pharmaceuticals, and consumer products, Galaxy Magnesium is leading the way to a lightweight future through reasonable, stable cost, guaranteed quality commercial magnesium.
